title: 谁知道BC端咋设置 cauldron端！！！
author: a1297866417
txt_content: 谁知道BC端咋跨到cauldron端来 端口什么都我都设置了 但是进不去显示一段英文

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content:
说明没设置好
servers: 
  登录服:
    address: 127.0.0.1:234
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1登录服'

server-port=234
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
force-gamemode=false
level-seed=
server-ip=127.0.0.1
要这样

replies.author: POPOfish
replies.txt_content: 一段英文是没有检测到登陆服

replies.author: a1297866417
replies.txt_content:
yangoo 发表于 2016-2-19 23:22
说明没设置好
